title: Ace denim on denim style just like Kareena Kapoor Khan
text:
View this post on Instagram A post shared by Kareena Kapoor Khan (@therealkareenakapoor) on Sep 30, 2019 at 6:08am PDT

A self-confessed homebody, Kareena Kapoor Khan is a lover of comfy casual. Bebo's style evolution may have taken several turns in her almost two-decade-long career, her love for denims remains uninterrupted. The actor, and mother, is a fervent fan of denim on denim trends, and if you're a fan of this fad too, we bring you three different ways to ace the trend in Bebo style. Scroll down.
description: Kareena Kapoor Khan is a fervent fan of denim on denim trends, and if you're a fan of this fad too, we bring you three different ways to ace the trend
